#text=It was my friend Riley 's birthday and I wanted to do something special for her this year .
#text=I usually buy her a birthday cake but this year I wanted to do something different .
#text=I was n't too sure how to make a cake but I decided to try a recipe I saw in a magazine .
#text=The day before I had purchased all of the ingredients including cake mix , eggs , and strawberries .
#text=I started off by cracking the eggs and putting it in a large bowl .
#text=I mixed in sugar and the cake mix according to the instructions .
#text=The instructions said to bake the whole mix in the oven for a couple of hours .
#text=When the cake was ready , I put on my oven mitts and removed it from the oven .
#text=It looked so good but one thing was missing .
#text=i went into the refrigerator and pulled out six fresh strawberries and placed them on top .
